name: Student of Sulunai
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 19
text: You have studied the life and works of the aasimar Sulunai, who led the people of Tianjing in a time of nationwide chaos. You know that second chances are opportunities for salvation.
benefit: Whenever a creature within 30 feet of you rerolls an ability check, saving throw, or skill check, you can give the creature a +2 insight bonus on the new roll as an immediate action. You can also cast divine favor as a spell-like ability once per day, using your character level as your caster level.
text_zh: 你在生活和工作等方面向苏露奈的神裔学习，意图在全国性的混乱中领导天京人民。你知道第二次机会会是救赎的契机。
benefit_zh: 当一个目标在你周围30尺内重骰一次属性检定、豁免检定或技能检定时，你能以一个直觉动作给予他的新骰掷结果+2洞察加值。每日一次，你也可以将神恩（divine favor）作为一个类法术能力施放，以你的角色等级作为施法者等级。
